specialRules.hint: When the hero activates pick one friendly unit within 12”, which gets the Fast rule next time it moves.
specialRules.name: Absolute Authority
specialRules.label: Absolute Authority
specialRules.description: When the hero activates pick one friendly unit within 12”, which gets the Fast rule next time it moves.

specialRules.hint: Whenever the hero’s unit fails a morale test roll one die. On a 4+ the morale test is passed instead.
specialRules.name: Lead from Behind
specialRules.label: Lead from Behind
specialRules.description: Whenever the hero’s unit fails a morale test roll one die. On a 4+ the morale test is passed instead.

specialRules.hint: This hero may only join Rat Swarm units. The hero and his unit get Regeneration.
specialRules.name: Piper
specialRules.label: Piper
specialRules.description: This hero may only join Rat Swarm units. The hero and his unit get Regeneration.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”. That unit counts as having Quality 2+ next time it takes a morale test.
specialRules.name: Piper’s Calling
specialRules.label: Piper’s Calling
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”. That unit counts as having Quality 2+ next time it takes a morale test.

specialRules.hint: When the hero activates pick 2 friendly units within 6”. Those units get +1 to their next morale test rolls.
specialRules.name: Safety in Numbers
specialRules.label: Safety in Numbers
specialRules.description: When the hero activates pick 2 friendly units within 6”. Those units get +1 to their next morale test rolls.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated roll one D3 to determine the X value of its Psychic(X) rule.
specialRules.name: Tangle
specialRules.label: Tangle
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated roll one D3 to determine the X value of its Psychic(X) rule.

spells.name: Filth
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Poison in melee next time it fights.

spells.name: Cracks
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Sickness
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 18” gets -1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Lightning
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Frenzy
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Pestilence
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6” takes 1 automatic hit per model.
